PUSH-IT

by Bootlegger

Released Nov 3, 2003
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

This is a simple puzzle game whereby you must remove all the available marbles from the game arena. To remove marbles, line up at least 3 of the same type. The marbles can be lined up vertical, horizontally, or diaganolly. After removing marbles if you have either 1 or 2 of that particular type left on the game arena it is then impossible to complete the level so the game will restart that level after deducting one live.
